tasks.label: [PROFILING] On small gravity test
tasks.command: cd ./Application ; sudo sysctl -w kernel.perf_event_paranoid=-1 ; sudo sysctl -w kernel.kptr_restrict=0 && perf record --no-inherit -g -- ./bin/Nebulite_Debug task TaskFiles/Benchmarks/gravity_classic.txt ; hotspot perf.data
tasks.detail: Run a debug Task on the Debug binary with perf to profile performance. Shows results both in CLI with perf and in a GUI using hotspot

tasks.label: [PROFILING] On large gravity test
tasks.command: cd ./Application ; sudo sysctl -w kernel.perf_event_paranoid=-1 ; sudo sysctl -w kernel.kptr_restrict=0  ; perf record --no-inherit -g -- ./bin/Nebulite_Debug task TaskFiles/Benchmarks/benchmark_gravity.txt ; hotspot perf.data
